header.description:
Hello there! Interested in some space facts with cool animations and all the planets orbiting right in front of you?
Well go ahead and check it out!
V0.01 Just a simple earth and Mars going in circles around the sun. V0.02 Math! Yes I added equations now the planets go in orbits around the sun and around their selfs. And made a cooler looking sun. V0.1 Major new look elliptical orbits. Much better and cleaner and faster orbiting planets. The planets move at a emulated speed from the real ones! Earth does 30 km/sec well it does the same here, The orbits are calculated by earth year timing. Only the planets befor the asteroid belt have been added. *soon i will add to planet zoom in, and info. Stay tuned for more, updates!
